verbs.description: [ARG0: Morning Joe] [V: hosts] [ARG1: Joe Scarborough and Mika Brzezinski] on Tuesday slammed White House adviser and alternative facts evangelist Kellyanne Conway for gloating over the resignation of a New York Democrat over domestic abuse accusations — as she continues to serve President Donald Trump .
